summary: A collection of utility routines supporting the HAN (Heterogeneous Graph Attention Network) example, including dataset loading and preprocessing, binary mask creation, reproducible random seed setting, experiment directory handling, logging setup, and an earlyâ€‘stopping mechanism for model training.
business_intent: Enable researchers and developers to efficiently run and evaluate heterogeneous graph neural network experiments with consistent data preparation, reproducibility, and automated training termination to avoid overfitting.
